description:
Sixth year i class. Age 15, Leo, blood type B. President of the Accounting Committee.
Is often portrayed as a leader among the 6th year seniors. Monjirou is a strict, serious senior that focuses on training mentally as much as physically, and his committee members often gets forced into his bizarre trainings such as using 10 kg abacus, sleeping in cold lake at midnight, making weapons out of food, etc. Despite his serious commitments into trainings, he is easily approached outside of training and has good relationship as a caring senior towards his juniors. He has a favourite word - gin gin - that who only used when he gets excited, angry, or emotional.
Source: Wiki
name: Shioe Monjirou
